about_the_game:
Get the official soundtrack for Passpartout and support our beloved composers! All revenue from this package goes directly into the pockets of our composers Synkronosaurus! Reach out to them at facebook.com/synkronosaurus or @synkronosaurus

All tracks written, performed and produced by SYNKRONOSAURUS

Additional performances by
Nicklas Dahlin, tenor saxophone (on tracks 1, 4)
Terese Lien Evenstad, violin (on tracks 1, 2, 3, 8)
Simon Fransman, piano solo (on track 6)
Kristofer Morhed, piano solo (on track 4)
Hillevi Rasmusson Klingberg, cello (on tracks 5, 8, 12)
Daniel Schwartz, guitar solo (on track 6)

Mastered by Mattias Wessel
